body.p: You approach the door on the #doorchoice and it slides open. You step through into the dark room beyond and the door slides shut behind you.
But the lights don’t turn on.

You take a step forward with your hands out in front of and feel a wall. You reach out and feel walls on either side as well. You’re in a room no bigger then a closet. With no lights. And no way out. If only you could go back and choose again…
